name: Undead End
description:
OBJECTIVE
  • Collect all of the keys and reach the exit.
  • You can only collect keys while you are human.
  • You may only exit while you are human.
SYSTEMS
  • If your health drops below a certain threshold, you become a zombie.
  • As a zombie, you must bite other humans to regain HP.
  • Your health decays over time.
  • If you reach 0 HP, or if you're a zombie and there are no humans left, the game ends.
  • Enemies move every other turn.
CONTROLS
  • WASD to move
  • LMB to bite while in zombie form
  • RMB to skip turn
